scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes a summons issued by Samuel D [?] to Thomas Greatton on May 21, 1790, offering 200 pounds of tobacco to Thomas Greatton if he appears as witness for Thomas Walker in the district court of Lewisburg in Greenbrier County for four days. Thomas Walker is in court against William McClung and George Lindenin.
